options.content: $cluster_name

targets.expr:
sum(rate(outbound_route_actual_response_total{classification="success", cluster_name="$cluster_name", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_kind=~"$workload_kind", workload_name=~"orders-.*"}[1m]))
/
sum(rate(outbound_route_actual_response_total{cluster_name="$cluster_name", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_kind=~"$workload_kind", workload_name=~"orders-.*"}[1m]))

sum(rate(outbound_route_actual_response_total{classification="success", cluster_name="$cluster_name", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_kind=~"$workload_kind", workload_name=~"orders-.*"}[1m])) by (workload_name)
/
sum(rate(outbound_route_response_total{cluster_name="$cluster_name", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_kind=~"$workload_kind", workload_name=~"orders-.*"}[1m])) by (workload_name)
